sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: New
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: amount={{Sent Back Requests amount}}^bill_no={{Sent Back Requests bill_no}}^category={{Sent Back Requests category}}^claim_date={{Sent Back Requests claim_date}}^claim_name={{Sent Back Requests claim_name}}^date_of_journey_from_date={{Sent Back Requests date_of_journey_from_date}}^date_of_journey_to_date={{Sent Back Requests date_of_journey_to_date}}^documents={{Sent Back Requests documents}}^dose={{Sent Back Requests dose}}^hospital_name={{Sent Back Requests hospital_name}}^injury_name={{Sent Back Requests injury_name}}^insurance_provider_name={{Sent Back Requests insurance_provider_name}}^lta_details={{Sent Back Requests lta_details}}^major_count={{Sent Back Requests major_count}}^major_ticket_cost_each={{Sent Back Requests major_ticket_cost_each}}^EQ
